name: Flick Champions Extreme Sports
description:
Soar through the air in your WINGSUIT, get the perfect shot in PAINTBALL, outrun the lava flow in ROCK CLIMBING, surge through the waves SURFING, feel the mud on your helmet in QUAD BIKES and finally free run as fast as you can in PARKOUR!


• 6 AWESOME EXTREME SPORTS: Quad Bikes, Windsuit, Parkour, Rock Climbing, Paintball and Surfing!
• 3 GAME MODES: Endless, Career and Multiplayer Challenges!
• TONS OF POWER-UPS: Paint Grenades, Force Fields, Jetpacks, Wave Boosters and more!
• GLOBAL CHALLENGES: Against friends or other gamers worldwide!
• STUNNING GRAPHICS: Applies to the remarkable X family and the legacy devices as well!


Visit Extreme Islands and jump into Career mode to win cups in every sport, conquering every discipline, challenge by challenge, on a tropical archipelago. Jump into Quick Game mode and master your favourite discipline or face skilled human opponents in Challenges mode... Enuff, right!?
